name: SFTP
description: Store files on a remote machine using SFTP.

root.name: Root
root.description: The root of the directories under Onitu's watch

hostname.name: Hostname
hostname.description: The hostname for the SFTP connection

username.name: Username
username.description: The username for the SFTP connection

password.name: Password
password.description: The password for the SFTP connection (if empty or missing, the private key will be used)

port.name: Port number
port.description: The port number for the SFTP connection

changes_timer.name: Timer for modification check
changes_timer.description: Time in seconds between two checks for files modifications

private_key_path.name: Private key path
private_key_path.description: The path to your private key file (optionnal)

private_key_passphrase.name: Private key passphrase
private_key_passphrase.description: The passphrase for your private key (optionnal if no private_key_path setted)
